body.p:
Albany Ky
January 21, 1861 --
Hon -- Beriah Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky
Sir:

I send you the petition of John Groom jr pleading for Executive Clemency -- Of the signers Wm Vann is Presiding Judge of Clinton county court, C. P. Gray is Clerk of the Circuit & County Courts, J. J. Wood is sheriff of the county, Others are very good citizens --
J A Morrison and myself, sympathizing with said Groom, he being very young and a boy of good sense and calculated to do good, replevied sa the fine for him a capias having issued against him.
Hoping that you will remit said fine, I have the honor to Subscribe myself your humble servant
